00014 #ifndef XSIGNAL_PRV_H_
00015 #define XSIGNAL_PRV_H_
00016 
00017 template <class Arg>
00018 class _XListenerImpl : public XListener
00019 {
00020 protected:
00021     _XListenerImpl(XListener::FLAGS flags)
00022         : XListener(flags), arg() {}
00023 public:
00024     virtual ~_XListenerImpl() {}
00025     virtual void operator() (const Arg &) const = 0;
00026     //! this is used when m_bAvoidDup is on.
00027     atomic_scoped_ptr<Arg> arg;
00028 };
00029 template <class Arg>
00030 class _XListenerStatic : public _XListenerImpl<Arg>
00031 {
00032     friend class XTalker<Arg>;
00033 protected:
00034     _XListenerStatic(void (*func)(const Arg &),
00035                      XListener::FLAGS flags) :
00036         _XListenerImpl<Arg>(flags), m_func(func) {
00037     }
00038 public:
00039     virtual void operator() (const Arg &x) const {
00040         (*m_func)(x);
00041     }
00042 private:
00043     void (*const m_func)(const Arg &);
00044 };
00045 template <class tClass, class Arg>
00046 class _XListenerWeak : public _XListenerImpl<Arg>
00047 {
00048     friend class XTalker<Arg>;
00049 protected:
00050     _XListenerWeak(const shared_ptr<tClass> &obj, void (tClass::*func)(const Arg &),
00051                    XListener::FLAGS flags) :
00052         _XListenerImpl<Arg>(flags), m_func(func), m_obj(obj) {
00053     }
00054 public:
00055     virtual void operator() (const Arg &x) const {
00056         if(shared_ptr<tClass> p = m_obj.lock() ) ((p.get())->*m_func)(x);
00057     }
00058 private:
00059     void (tClass::*const m_func)(const Arg &);
00060     const weak_ptr<tClass> m_obj;
00061 };
00062 template <class tClass, class Arg>
00063 class _XListenerShared : public _XListenerImpl<Arg>
00064 {
00065     friend class XTalker<Arg>;
00066 protected:
00067     _XListenerShared(const shared_ptr<tClass> &obj, void (tClass::*func)(const Arg &),
00068                      XListener::FLAGS flags) :
00069         _XListenerImpl<Arg>(flags), m_obj(obj), m_func(func)   {
00070         ASSERT(obj);
00071     }
00072 public:
00073     virtual void operator() (const Arg &x) const {((m_obj.get())->*m_func)(x);}
00074 private:
00075     void (tClass::*m_func)(const Arg &);
00076     const shared_ptr<tClass> m_obj;
00077 };
00078 
00079 #endif /*XSIGNAL_PRV_H_*/
